mapper.select: select level lv, articleNO, parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || title title, content, writeDate, id from board start with parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC

select lv, articleNO, parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(lv-1)) || title title, content , writeDate, id from ( select rownum rn, level lv, articleNO, parentNO, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || title title, content, writeDate, id from board where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{amount} start with parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC ) where rn> (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into board(articleNO, parentNO, title, content, writeDate, id) values(seq_board.nextval, #{parentNO}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{id})
insert into board(articleNO, parentNO, title, content, writeDate, id) values(seq_board.nextval, #{parentNO}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{id})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where articleNO=#{articleNO}
